SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.enterprise_architecture.essential.widgets
Class XMLRenderer

java.lang.Object
  com.enterprise_architecture.essential.widgets.XMLRenderer

public class XMLRenderer
extends Object

Class to render an XML snapshot of the repository. Currently, only the simple instances are snap-shotted. Classes, slots etc. are not rendered from the KnowledgeBase. This class owes a lot to the XMLStorer class in the Protege XML Storage package but is designed to operate properly in client/server mode. The XML rendered is of the same format produced by the XMLStorer class.

Since:
version 1.2 of EasReportTab
Version:
1.1 - refactored package name
, 1.2 - introduced the timestamp tag and new schema definition (to include this tag)
Author:
Jonathan W. Carter
See Also:
EasReportTab

renderTimeStamp

private String renderTimeStamp()
Render the current date/time in the XSD DataTime format

Returns:
the current date time (now) rendered an XSD Date Time format, by default yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss but can be set using the #setItsTimeStampFormatString method

setItsTimeStampFormatString

public void setItsTimeStampFormatString(String theTimeStampFormatString)
Define the java.text.SimpleDateFormat string for the timestamp tag value. This must result in a valid XSD dateTime format.

Parameters:
theTimeStampFormatString - the itsTimeStampFormatString to set
Since:
version 1.2
